# style

**Instance Property**

The style of corners drawn by the rounded rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
var style: RoundedCornerStyle
```

## Getting the shape’s characteristics

- **cornerSize**: The width and height of the rounded rectangle’s corners.

items.description: The width and height of the rounded rectangle’s corners.
